overview:
Saurabh is a technocrat with 10+ years of experience in the areas of Strategic Planning, Profit Centre Operations, Project Management, Application Design, Development & Implementation, Key Account Management, IT Infrastructure Management, Resource Planning & Control.

Specialties Expertise in end-to-end program planning and implementation from scope management, to activity sequencing, effort & cost estimation to quality management Contract management with Vendors & Clients, SLA adherence between clients and organization, Presales, project executions & business expansions plans Experience in complete project management â€“ presales, IT project design and execution, resource management, project delivery.
